overview:
As Vice President of Sales, Jonathan Witte is responsible for driving product sales, account development and sales engineering in North America.

Jonathan brings 16 years of digital media sales background in the areas of web, video management, content syndication, online advertising and loyalty programs.

Before joining MobileBits, Jonathan was the head of sales of NeuLion Pro Sports. While there, he was responsible for driving sales and revenue around NeuLion’s’ TV Everywhere strategy. Prior, Jonathan demonstrated successes in the social media IP industries where he led sales successes at Pringo and Neighborhood America (now Engage Networks).

In the past he has also held executive management positions with Highwall Technology (acquired by Mobilesecure), Sabratech (acquired by Software AG), Avnet and Computer Associates.
